definition: surname Wei/name of vassal state of Zhou dynasty from 661 BC in Shanxi, one of the Seven Hero Warring States/Wei state, founded by Cao Cao 曹操[Cao2 Cao1], one of the Three Kingdoms after the Han dynasty/the Wei dynasty 221-265/Wei prefecture and Wei county at different historical periods

sentences.english: A series of dramatic events marked the end of the Weimar Republic.
sentences.chinese: 一系列戲劇性的事件標誌着魏瑪共和國的終結。

sentences.english: Fred:Well, Wilma, It's no time for games.
sentences.chinese: 哎，魏瑪，我可沒沒時間陪你玩遊戲。

sentences.english: Are we at another Weimar moment now?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，我們正在經歷又一個魏瑪時刻嗎？

sentences.english: The economic and political atmosphere shares certain parallels with Weimar Germany or Pre-Peronist Argentina.
sentences.chinese: 這種經濟政治環境堪比德國魏瑪以及阿根廷庇隆黨。
